properties.title: Open-Source Java implementation of the german DTAUS file format
properties.author: Christian Schulte

section.name: Introduction
section.p: jDTAUS provides an implementation of the german DTAUS file format as specified by Zentraler Kreditausschuss for the Java platform. Currently it implements the DTAUS specification as published on theire website at www.zka.de versioned 2.1 and dated september 2006. Great care has been taken to fully comply with this specification which was one of the goals of this project. A violation to the specification should be considered a bug.

There is a GUI application available to demonstrate the main features. It is distributed using Java-Webstart. You will first have to install the latest Java Runtime Environment available at http://www.java.com. After downloading and installing Java, the following link will web-start the application.

section.name: Releases
section.p: This project uses the central Maven 2 repository to distribute its artifacts. Binary releases are available in group org.jdtaus.

section.name: Sourcecode
section.p: Currently we do not maintain any source code releases. If you want to build yourself you will need to checkout the sources from the project's repository. The project's build process is implemented using Maven 2. See http://maven.apache.org for details.

section.name: Support
section.p: It is pretty easy to get support directly from a developer if you need help or if you find bugs that need to be reported. Simply write a mail to support@jdtaus.org. There is a Bugzilla installation at http://bugzilla.jdtaus.org/bugzilla/. Please browse for possible bugs before reporting.

A mailing list is available for public discussion regarding the development of the various artifacts. See the lists for further information. You may want to sent your code to the jdtaus-users mailing list for public review.
